text:
Hi everyone, I'm new to HubSpot
Can anyone help me fix the error from the code below. I cloned the CMS boilerplate
Now I am trying to change the `Hero.banner.html`  and use a component from Tailwind but I am getting an error DragDropArgumentExcerption
`<!--`
  `templateType: section`
  `label: Hero banner`
  `isAvailableForNewContent: true`
  `screenshotPath: ../images/section-previews/hero-banner.png`
  `description: "Full size background image section separated in two columns. Left column has heading and text and right column has a form."`
`-->`



  `{% dnd_section`
  `background_color={{ context.background_color or "#f8fafc" }},`
`%}`
  `<div class="overflow-hidden bg-white py-24 sm:py-32">`
  `<div class="mx-auto max-w-7xl px-6 lg:px-8">`
    `<div class="mx-auto grid max-w-2xl grid-cols-1 gap-x-8 gap-y-16 sm:gap-y-20 lg:mx-0 lg:max-w-none lg:grid-cols-2">`
      `<div class="lg:pr-8 lg:pt-4">`
        `<div class="lg:max-w-lg">`
          `<h2 class="text-base font-semibold leading-7 text-indigo-600">`
          `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
            `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
          `Deploy faster`
        `{% end_module_attribute %}`
      `{% end_dnd_module %}`
          `</h2>`
          `<p class="mt-2 text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight text-gray-900 sm:text-4xl">`
          `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
            `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
          `A better workflow`
        `{% end_module_attribute %}`
      `{% end_dnd_module %}`
          `</p>`
          `<p class="mt-6 text-lg leading-8 text-gray-600">`
          `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
            `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
          `Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Maiores impedit perferendis suscipit eaque, iste dolor cupiditate blanditiis ratione.`
        `{% end_module_attribute %}`
      `{% end_dnd_module %}`
          `</p>`
          `<dl class="mt-10 max-w-xl space-y-8 text-base leading-7 text-gray-600 lg:max-w-none">`
            `<div class="relative pl-9">`
              `<dt class="inline font-semibold text-gray-900">`
                `<svg class="absolute left-1 top-1 h-5 w-5 text-indigo-600" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true">`
                  `<path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M5.5 17a4.5 4.5 0 01-1.44-8.765 4.5 4.5 0 018.302-3.046 3.5 3.5 0 014.504 4.272A4 4 0 0115 17H5.5zm3.75-2.75a.75.75 0 001.5 0V9.66l1.95 2.1a.75.75 0 101.1-1.02l-3.25-3.5a.75.75 0 00-1.1 0l-3.25 3.5a.75.75 0 101.1 1.02l1.95-2.1v4.59z" clip-rule="evenodd" />`
                `</svg>`
                `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
                  `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
                `Push to deploy.`
              `{% end_module_attribute %}`
            `{% end_dnd_module %}`
              `</dt>`
              `<dd class="inline">`
              `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
                `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
              `Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Maiores impedit perferendis suscipit eaque, iste dolor cupiditate blanditiis ratione.`
            `{% end_module_attribute %}`
          `{% end_dnd_module %}`
              `</dd>`
            `</div>`
            `<div class="relative pl-9">`
              `<dt class="inline font-semibold text-gray-900">`
                `<svg class="absolute left-1 top-1 h-5 w-5 text-indigo-600" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true">`
                  `<path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 1a4.5 4.5 0 00-4.5 4.5V9H5a2 2 0 00-2 2v6a2 2 0 002 2h10a2 2 0 002-2v-6a2 2 0 00-2-2h-.5V5.5A4.5 4.5 0 0010 1zm3 8V5.5a3 3 0 10-6 0V9h6z" clip-rule="evenodd" />`
                `</svg>`
                `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
                  `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
                `SSL certificates.`
              `{% end_module_attribute %}`
            `{% end_dnd_module %}`
              `</dt>`
              `<dd class="inline">`
              `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
                `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
              `Anim aute id magna aliqua ad ad non deserunt sunt. Qui irure qui lorem cupidatat commodo.`
            `{% end_module_attribute %}`
          `{% end_dnd_module %}`
              `</dd>`
            `</div>`
            `<div class="relative pl-9">`
              `<dt class="inline font-semibold text-gray-900">`
                `<svg class="absolute left-1 top-1 h-5 w-5 text-indigo-600" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true">`
                  `<path d="M4.632 3.533A2 2 0 016.577 2h6.846a2 2 0 011.945 1.533l1.976 8.234A3.489 3.489 0 0016 11.5H4c-.476 0-.93.095-1.344.267l1.976-8.234z" />`
                  `<path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 13a2 2 0 100 4h12a2 2 0 100-4H4zm11.24 2a.75.75 0 01.75-.75H16a.75.75 0 01.75.75v.01a.75.75 0 01-.75.75h-.01a.75.75 0 01-.75-.75V15zm-2.25-.75a.75.75 0 00-.75.75v.01c0 .414.336.75.75.75H13a.75.75 0 00.75-.75V15a.75.75 0 00-.75-.75h-.01z" clip-rule="evenodd" />`
                `</svg>`
                `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
                  `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
                `Database backups.`
              `{% end_module_attribute %}`
            `{% end_dnd_module %}`
              `</dt>`
              `<dd class="inline">`
              `{% dnd_module path='<@UDA553DRD>/rich_text' %}`
            `{% module_attribute "html"%}`
              `Ac tincidunt sapien vehicula erat auctor pellentesque rhoncus. Et magna sit morbi lobortis.`
            `{% end_module_attribute %}`
          `{% end_dnd_module %}`
              `</dd>`
            `</div>`
          `</dl>`
        `</div>`
      `</div>`
      `{% dnd_module`
    `path="<@UDA553DRD>/linked_image",`
    `img={`
      `"alt": context.image_alt or "Stock placeholder image with grayscale geometrical mountain landscape",`
      `"loading": context.image_loading or "disabled",`
      `"max_height": context.image_height or 451,`
      `"max_width": context.image_width or 605,`
      `"size_type": "auto_custom_max",`
      `"class"="w-[48rem] max-w-none rounded-xl shadow-xl ring-1 ring-gray-400/10 sm:w-[57rem] md:-ml-4 lg:-ml-0"`
      `"src": "<https://tailwindui.com/img/component-images/dark-project-app-screenshot.png>"`
    `},`
    `offset=4,`
    `width=8`
  `%}`
  `{% end_dnd_module %}`
    `</div>`
  `</div>`
`</div>`
`{% end_dnd_section %`}
You can't. For independent modules, due to the requirements, HubL standard tags aren't really usable. For the logo you'd want to use a  Logo field + link field instead of the standard  tag.
Hi all, in the meta.json of a module, is the `icon` field used to set these icons seen in the editor view? & if so, what file types are acceptable?
When you set it in the editor this is what it says <@U06PNCY2EGG>
Thank you! I couldnâ€™t find that option, now I have the info I need
